daily.label: Daily
daily.recurrence_explanation: A closure will be created for each day you select. Each of these closures will run during the hours and between the overall dates you already set up for this closure.

interval.label: Interval-based
interval.recurrence_explanation: Creates multiple closures, each lasting %{duration}, starting every %{interval} %{anchor_point}

anchor_point_explanations.CLOSURE_START: from the start of the previous closure
anchor_point_explanations.CLOSURE_END: from the end of the previous closure

preset_name.label: Preset name

preset_description.label: Preset description
